svg.title: U.S. Rainwater Law Map (2025)
svg.desc: Placeholder infographic map indicating that rainwater harvesting is legal in all 50 states with varying local rules.

g.text: Legal in all 50 states. Local rules vary for potable use, permits, and plumbing.
